name: Project B (Lanna)
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

MOVEMENT:  Use the Arrow Keys or [W][A][S][D]

PAUSE GAME: Press [P] or ESCAPE

RESTART GAME: Press [R]

CREDITS:

A remake of the original 2048 game by Gabriele Cirulli

GAME ENGINE: Unity and UnityWebGL

SOUND EFFECTS:  UI Audio package by Kenney

FONTS:  Font package by Kenney
